title: ரசீது இல்லா தங்கத்துக்கு அதிகபட்ச அபராதம் விதிக்க திட்டமா?
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: Finance Ministry Sources to ANI: There is no Gold amnesty scheme under consideration of Income Tax Department as being reported in media. As the budget process is on, typically these type of speculative reports do appear. pic.twitter.com/a57OJWNYoa
